resources.string: The app will now try to save files that it opens. They will be stored under the specified path.
The app will NOT try to save files.
Please select a folder for saving files.
(The path might not be displayed in a recognizable form. Tap on it if you wish to change it.)
It might take time (or a reboot, or two) for this to be (fully) effective. (That is, to be able to work with all your apps, or most of the apps.)
